hyp: 文 4 : The data from Phase IIb to IIIb clinical trials was pooled and analyzed. The analysis revealed that adverse reactions observed with combined therapy (dolutegravir+abacavir/lamivudine were generally consistent with those observed with monotherapy (dolutegravir/abacavir/lamivudine).
